channel.title: List of dashboards a visualisation is used
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I wanted to ask if there is any plan to add under each visualisation on how many dashboards it is used. That would be really helpful since I have many listed queries and each really difficult to track down if each of those is used somewhere on not.
Looking forward to a response and many thanks for the support!

item.title: List of dashboards a visualisation is used
item.dc:creator: ilyaminati
item.description:
Similar request: it would be nice to know all the queries in which a data source is used (i.e., can I remove a data source without breaking queries?).

Read full topic
item.source: List of dashboards a visualisation is used
